Good morning, I have doubts about which radio version is required in the reefscape season games. can anyone tell me?

Your VH-109 needs to be running 1.2.8 or higher.
Information about updating the firmware can be found here
https://frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net/overview/upgrading-firmware

Update the new modem that comes from the kit by following the link https://frc-radio.vivid-hosting.net/, then go to the configuration page of the modem from your browser with the IP value you set and select 2.4ghz access point mode. After the update, remove the small tape under the modem and turn on the 3rd switch. Turn it on, this will cause the modem to run this mode in the 2.4ghz mode you set. provides

for the firmware,ı thınk the supplier site has shared the last version of firmware in the documentary

It’s because when my team looked at the website, we only found version 1.2.8 which is the version already installed

Caution: I would recommend you delete this post or at least remove the link to the radio firmware image directly.

Reasoning: The terms “latest”, “current”, “Next Generation”, Etc… immediately become OUT OF DATE as soon as a new version is released, and if there is one thing I know about software, its that there is a new version already being worked on.

So in the future, say 5 years from now, someone will search CD for firmware and attempt to download what you’ve linked. It will either succeed and they will be flashing OLD and OUTDATED firmware to their radio, OR the link will fail as new firmware is released and you will get messages asking where to find the current firmware.

So perhaps link the firmware page that VH maintains, or just mention the current version with todays date to time-stamp your message for future readers/consumers.
